text: Kasone, ki kufr varzidand, megujand: «Qijomat hargiz ʙa suroƣi mo naxohad omad». Bigu: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoram, ki donoi ƣajʙ ast, hatman, ʙa suroƣaton meojad. hamsangi zarrae dar osmonho va zamin az U pusida nest va kucaktar va ʙuzurgtar az on zarra cize nest, magar on ki dar kitoʙe oskor [Lavhi mahfuz] saʙt ast
